dc_title_s: Profile of the lakes and Atlantic waterways via the Great Lakes and connecting rivers: the St. Lawrence River and the Champlain--Hudson Valley from Chicago and Duluth--Superior to New York and Quebec; prepared by the Engineering Department of the Sanitary District of Chicago.
dc_description_s: Blueprint. Printed on 2 sheets, joined. Signed "Dr. James B. Angell, compliments of L. Cooley." Stamped on verso: "Sanitary District of Chicago, Jan 2 1896, received Division 2" and F. Mayer & Co. logo. 1 profile: photocopy, hand col.; 28 x 375 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
